Easa ATPL Question Bank (2016)

Summary General Test Part Review Part Contact

Summary

Easa ATPL learning question bank consist of 14 chapters. You can have a test for each of the 14 chapter and later on you can review your exam

General

  • Peson Editor to create and edit Person info
  • Them control with Color and Hue sliders, Select the person before enter to the person editor and save
  • There are 2 parts, the test part and the review part

Useage

Test part

Go To Test
  • From main menue select test
  • Select the person for the test applied to if not exist create a new person from the Person link
  • Select Category, Chapter and Subject
  • Select the Is Learning Mode if you want that the timer will not automatically finish the test at the end of thetest time
  • Select Start
      • Durring the test:
    • Select the right answere
    • You can Mark a question for further use in the review enable you to filter by Marks
    • At the end select fininf
    • if you want to save the resut press Save, otherwise Select new test

Review Part

Go To Review
  • From the main maue select Review
  • Filters
    • Filter by test, Select the Category, Subject and Chapter
    • Filter by Perso select the person name or All
    • Filter by Answare result Answared, Wrong, Marked etc..
  • Presst the Get Exam
    • The existing exams will fetch
  • Select the exam you want
    • Load, will load the selected exam
    • Load combine, will combine all the exam results from the same chaper
    • Delete, delete the exam from the database
  • From the Question list nav you can apply local filter on which you want to review
